alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 1:57PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Schuyler, northern Chemung, west central Tioga and southwestern Tompkins Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Horseheads North, or near Elmira, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Horseheads, Elmira Heights, Danby, Erin, Spencer, Cayuta, Van Etten, Breesport, South Danby and Horseheads North. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 51B and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
